languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс не успевает остановить вас: от удара разорванные кабели разлетаются в разные стороны, хлеща искрами и брызгами зловонной багровой жижи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс не успевает остановить вас: от удара разорванные кабели разлетаются в разные стороны, хлеща искрами и брызгами зловонной багровой жижи.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fails to stop you in time: your blow sends the torn cables whipping out in every direction, scattering sparks and droplets of noxious scarlet slime.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс не успевает остановить вас: от удара разорванные кабели разлетаются в разные стороны, хлеща искрами и брызгами зловонной багровой жижи.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fails to stop you in time: your blow sends the torn cables whipping out in every direction, scattering sparks and droplets of noxious scarlet slime.{/n}
{n}Heinrix fails to stop you in time: your blow sends the torn cables whipping out in every direction, scattering sparks and droplets of noxious scarlet slime.{/n}
{n}Heinrix fails to stop you in time: your blow sends the torn cables whipping out in every direction, scattering sparks and droplets of noxious scarlet slime.{/n}
{n}Heinrix fails to stop you in time: your blow sends the torn cables whipping out in every direction, scattering sparks and droplets of noxious scarlet slime.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希没能及时阻止你。你猛力一击，撕裂的电缆朝四面八方飞去，火花与有毒的红色黏液四处飞溅。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix fails to stop you in time: your blow sends the torn cables whipping out in every direction, scattering sparks and droplets of noxious scarlet slime.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希没能及时阻止你。你猛力一击，撕裂的电缆朝四面八方飞去，火花与有毒的红色黏液四处飞溅。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix no logra detenerte a tiempo: tu golpe hace que los cables arrancados se agiten en todas las direcciones, desperdigando chispas y gotas de un nocivo cieno escarlata por todas partes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix fails to stop you in time: your blow sends the torn cables whipping out in every direction, scattering sparks and droplets of noxious scarlet slime.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix no logra detenerte a tiempo: tu golpe hace que los cables arrancados se agiten en todas las direcciones, desperdigando chispas y gotas de un nocivo cieno escarlata por todas partes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは間一髪であなたを止めることができなかった。あなたの一撃でちぎれたケーブルが四方八方に飛び散り、火花と有害な緋色の粘液の飛沫が飛び散る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix fails to stop you in time: your blow sends the torn cables whipping out in every direction, scattering sparks and droplets of noxious scarlet slime.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは間一髪であなたを止めることができなかった。あなたの一撃でちぎれたケーブルが四方八方に飛び散り、火花と有害な緋色の粘液の飛沫が飛び散る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix kann dir nicht rechtzeitig Einhalt gebieten: Dein Schlag lässt die durchtrennten Kabel in alle Richtungen davonschnellen, Funken sprühen, und giftige rote Schleimtropfen spritzen umher.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix fails to stop you in time: your blow sends the torn cables whipping out in every direction, scattering sparks and droplets of noxious scarlet slime.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix kann dir nicht rechtzeitig Einhalt gebieten: Dein Schlag lässt die durchtrennten Kabel in alle Richtungen davonschnellen, Funken sprühen, und giftige rote Schleimtropfen spritzen umher.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ne parvient pas à vous arrêter à temps. Les câbles tranchés se tortillent dans tous les sens, projetant des étincelles et des gouttes de liquide écarlate nocif.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix fails to stop you in time: your blow sends the torn cables whipping out in every direction, scattering sparks and droplets of noxious scarlet slime.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ne parvient pas à vous arrêter à temps. Les câbles tranchés se tortillent dans tous les sens, projetant des étincelles et des gouttes de liquide écarlate nocif.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix seni vaktinde durdurmayı başaramıyor. Bir darbeyle kopardığın kablolar her yöne saçılırken kıvılcımlar çıkarıp kızıl renkli, muzır bir balçık yayıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix fails to stop you in time: your blow sends the torn cables whipping out in every direction, scattering sparks and droplets of noxious scarlet slime.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, seni vaktinde durdurmayı başaramıyor. Bir darbeyle kopardığın kablolar her yöne saçılırken kıvılcımlar çıkarıp kızıl renkli, muzır bir balçık yayıyor.{/n}
